tutorial.paragraph1:
Welcome to
the 1 vs. 1 game,
 compete against
 another player.
tutorial.paragraph2:
Phase 1:
  Collect pororós
on the dynamic bar.
tutorial.paragraph3:
Move with A-D
or the arrows,
action button
Enter or space.
tutorial.paragraph4:
Intercept pororós
with precision to
  earn points.
tutorial.paragraph5:
Phase 2:
 Spend pororós in
the store for items.
tutorial.paragraph6:
Phase 3:
Fight using skills
acquired in the store.
